mapper.insert: INSERT INTO registerTable(registerId, registerPassword, registerRePassword, registerName, registerBirth, registerGender, registerEmail, registerPhone1, registerPhone2, registerPhone3) VALUES(#{registerId}, #{registerPassword}, #{registerRePassword}, #{registerName}, #{registerBirth}, #{registerGender}, #{registerEmail}, #{registerPhone1}, #{registerPhone2}, #{registerPhone3})
mapper.select: SELECT userRegisterId FROM userRegisterTable WHERE userRegisterId = #{idOverlapCheck}
